name: formula4-race-analytics
description: Formula 4 Race Analytics - Advanced telemetry analysis platform

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:data"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.install-all: npm install && npm run install:backend && npm run install:data
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend && npm run test:data

author: Formula 4 Race Analytics Team
